alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:11PM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
